CSL_EpwmEtCfg Struct Reference
IP » EPWM

Structure holding the Event Trigger Sub-Module configuration parameters. More...

#include <csl_epwm.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t intrEvtSource
 
uint32_t intrPrd
 

Detailed Description

Structure holding the Event Trigger Sub-Module configuration parameters.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_EpwmEtCfg::intrEvtSource

Event which is the source of the interrupt. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmEtIntrEvt_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmEtCfg::intrPrd

Interrupt period which determine how many selected events need to occur before an interrupt is generated. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmEtIntrPeriod_t.
